001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model;
002
003import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
004import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.entity.User;
006import java.util.List;
007
008/**
009 * Domain class handing Board object.
010 */
011public class Board {
012
013  @Expose
014  private final User player;
015  @Expose
016  @SerializedName("toShots")
017  private final List<Shot> shots;
018  @Expose
019  private final List<Ship> ships;
020  @Expose
021  private final boolean placed;
022  @Expose
023  private final boolean fleetSunk;
024  @Expose
025  private boolean mine;
026
027  /**
028   * Constructor that initiates final fields.
029   * @param player The specified player for a certain board.
030   * @param shots A list of shots against a specified board.
031   * @param ships A list of ships placed on a specified board.
032   * @param placed A boolean flag for when the ships have been locked into place at the start of a game.
033   * @param fleetSunk A boolean flag testing if a player has had all their ships sunk, eliminating them from the game.
034   */
035  public Board(User player, List<Shot> shots, List<Ship> ships, boolean placed, boolean fleetSunk) {
036    this.player = player;
037    this.shots = shots;
038    this.ships = ships;
039    this.placed = placed;
040    this.fleetSunk = fleetSunk;
041  }
042
043  /**
044   * gets the User for a board.
045   * @return player.
046   */
047  public User getPlayer() {
048    return player;
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Gets the List<Shots> against a board.
053   * @return shots.
054   */
055  public List<Shot> getShots() {
056    return shots;
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Gets the ships on a board.
061   * @return ships.
062   */
063  public List<Ship> getShips() {
064    return ships;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * tests whether ships have been locked in or not.
069   * @return placed.
070   */
071  public boolean isPlaced() {
072    return placed;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Tests whether all your ships have been sunk or not.
077   * @return fleetSunk.
078   */
079  public boolean isFleetSunk() {
080    return fleetSunk;
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Tests to find which board is the current users.
085   * @return mine.
086   */
087  public boolean isMine() {
088    return mine;
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Sets the board to a specific user.
093   * @param mine boolean mine.
094   */
095  public void setMine(boolean mine) {
096    this.mine = mine;
097  }
098}
099
100
